name: octa

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: OCTA is an integrated simulation system for soft materials.

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: gnuplot
dependencies.description:
Gnuplot is a portable command-line driven graphing utility for Linux,
OS/2, MS Windows, OSX, VMS, and many other platforms. The source code is
copyrighted but freely distributed (i.e., you don't have to pay for it).
It was originally created to allow scientists and students to visualize
mathematical functions and data interactively, but has grown to support
many non-interactive uses such as web scripting. It is also used as a
plotting engine by third-party applications like Octave. Gnuplot has
been supported and under active development since 1986

dependencies.name: jogl
dependencies.description:
JOGL provides full access to the APIs in the OpenGL specification as
well as nearly all vendor extensions.

dependencies.name: libjpeg
dependencies.description:
libjpeg is a widely used free library with functions for handling the
JPEG image data format. It implements a JPEG codec (encoding and
decoding) alongside various utilities for handling JPEG data.

dependencies.name: libpng
dependencies.description: libpng is the official PNG reference library.

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: py-numba
dependencies.description: NumPy aware dynamic Python compiler using LLVM

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.

dependencies.name: zlib-api
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.
